description: (1) Demolition of existing buildings.(2) 	Redevelopment of the site with the erection of buildings between 3 & 5 storeys in height;(3) Use of the new buildings as 600 sq.m. of commercial floor space (B1) and a total of 142 student rooms(arranged in the form of 115 en-suite study rooms in clusters of two, three, four and five bedrooms plus 27 studio flats) for student housing plus cycle parking and a communal courtyard. Minor Material Amendments to Planning permission Ref: PA/06/01783, Dated 28/06/2007: Amendments include:Con 17(Community managment Plan)Con 21(Management system)to allow occupancy outside of academic term by non students for a maximum of 13 weeks per year.
site_name: Pacific Court, 15 Assembly Passage, London E1 4EY (Former 45-51 Redmans Road, London)
